name.ja: <ruby>蝕<rt>エクリプス</rt></ruby>の<ruby>双<rt>ふた</rt></ruby><ruby>仔<rt>ご</rt></ruby>

text.en:
2 Level 4 monsters
For this card's Xyz Summon, you can treat Rank 4 monsters you control as Level 4 monsters for material. You can detach 1 material from this card; this card can make up to 2 attacks on monsters during each Battle Phase this turn. If this card is sent to the GY: You can target 2 other Rank 4 or lower Xyz Monsters in your GY; Special Summon 1 of the 2, and if you do, attach the other to it. You can only use this effect of "Twins of the Eclipse" once per turn.
